name: Car Service
description:
This game was created for a school project.

How to play
- Drag and drop cars to a free parking spot of the service that is shown over them.
- As soon as it finishes you can move it to the next service if it wants one, or move it to the three parking spots on the right hand side of the street.
- Unlock new parking spots by clicking on the building next to the service you want a new spot for.
